thread.title: Kylie Minogue 'calls off engagement to actor fiancé Joshua Sasse over cheating suspicions'
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue 'calls off engagement to actor fiancé Joshua Sasse over cheating suspicions'

author: Mirror .co.uk
title: Kylie Minogue 'calls off engagement to actor fiancé Joshua Sasse over cheating suspicions'
text:
Kylie Minogue 'calls off engagement to actor fiancé Joshua Sasse over cheating suspicions' The pop star is said to be heartbroken after throwing the British actor out of her house Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kylie Minogue has called off her engagement to actor fiancé Joshua Sasse, it was reported tonight. 
The Can't Get You Out Of My Head singer, 48, met Sasse, 29, in 2015 on the set of US series Galavant, in which he stars and she was making a guest appearance. 
The pair announced their engagement in February 2016. 
But according to The Sun, the Australian star has broken off the engagement because she suspects Sasse of cheating with another actress. 
Minogue recently told The Daily Mail that she planned to take her husband-to-be's name when they married. Kylie Minogue (Photo: Getty) (Photo: FameFlynet.uk.com) 
She said: "Kylie Sasse is a great name... Kylie Minogue has never exactly tripped off the tongue. 
"I'll definitely be taking Sasse but there will be Minogue in there somewhere." 
Earlier today, Minogue tweeted that she had signed a new record deal with label BMG. 
She wrote: "£lovers ... So happy to announce my new record label is BMG. I promise you will have my heart..." 
Kylie's spokesperson declined to comment. 
A spokesperson for Joshua has been contacted for comment.
